This top is an adorable choice for everyday wear. The quality material is soft, color is attractive, and the sizing is perfect, offering a comfortable fit. At 5’9”, it falls at lower hip/upper thigh. The pleats and ribbing around the neck and sleeves add charming details that elevate its casual style.  This top is poised to become a go-to piece for the spring, fall, and warmer winter days.
I got this for six dollars so I’ll keep it. But it doesn’t flatter me.  The arm/wrist area is weirdly big. I am a small and it makes me look frumpy.  Maybe I will return it!
The material is so soft it's like wearing a t-shirt.  The fit is perfect and it's actually cool enough to wear year-round.

I love this shirt and cannot wait until cooler weather, when I can actually wear it. The teal is my favorite color, and the material is so soft. Thanks to the pleats, it drapes beautifully. The striped color and cuffs are a fun addition, without being too much. This skims the body, doesn't cling where you don't want it to. ;) Will be great for weekend wear, or casual Friday in the office.

Very flattering cut.  Color does not quite match the shade on the product photo, but there are variations due to electronic screens.  Still very pretty.  Cut is a bit loose, which is the way I prefer it, not skin tight.  Sizing is spot on.

The color is beautiful. The quality seems very nice. It’s comfortable. The wrists and neck are an elastic like material which I like on the wrists because I tend to push my sleeves up a lot. The stripes on the trim are a nice detail.

This cute top is great for those in-between seasons when it's not too hot or too cold. It is very comfortable, and it can be super casual, or dressed up a bit with jewelry. The trim and pleats give it a more fun trendy look.

评论概述: Great top at a great price!
评论详情: I just got this long sleeve top because I really love this style of the vertical lines on top, it is really attractive on my figure and this one is no different! I love the color block design around the neck and sleeves, it makes it look a lot more unique, and the material is soft and comfortable. It's also true to size, so you don't have to worry about it being too big or too small. I ordered my usual size, which is XL and it fits perfectly. I've already worn it a few times, and it's been a good experience each time. I would Recommend it for sure!  I hope My Review has been Helpful!! 😊👍

I have a few pieces from Merokeety and find them to be a nice value for the price. This sweater's material has a nice feel to it, with a smooth, well-weighted, tight-knit. The sweater drapes nicely and can be worn loose or tucked in. The pleats offer a nice, subtle detail that works well with the fabric.  I ordered the top in apricot, which is more of a nice ivory shade.
This is a pretty shirt. It is soft and drapes nicely. I love the contract at the neck and wrists. I found it to be very flattering and would definitely recommend this top.
This shirt is so comfortable. Fabric is soft and lightweight. Fit is comfortable. Love the detailed neckline and sleeves.

Ordered this to wear on somewhat cooler days.  It is lightweight, so it would be good for a fall or spring day.  The material is soft and the color is more like the original picture not the one I posted (bad lighting).

This shirt has a cute design and a nice texture. The color really pops and it washes excellently. It did have two threads out from the bottom which I cut and haven't had issues with since and the sizing was perfect on me.
